I am a fourth year Finance Student at the University of Alberta. Throughout my time at the Alberta School of Business, I have gained valuable experience through co-op and internships, as well as through my participation in courses offered by the University.

## Focus

During the final year of my degree I am commited to seeking increasingly complex challenges in my coursework and extracurricular activities.

## Principles

When engaged in professionally related tasks, I operate on the principles of discipline, respect, punctuality, integrity, and productive collaboration.

## Professional Interests

My professional interests include trading, financial research, and data analytics/programming with respect to financial decision making and problem solving.

## Personal Interests

My personal interests include guitar with a focus on improvisation, playing hockey, board games, fitness, and comedy.
